hero.title: Support for Small and Medium Businesses in Poland
hero.subtitle: State acceleration program: training, mentoring, funding and expansion to new markets

about.title: What is WP Fund?
about.subtitle: WP Fund is a state program to support entrepreneurs, aimed at developing small and medium enterprises in Poland. We help businesses scale, enter new markets and gain access to funding.

mentoring.title: Individual support
mentoring.description: Personal approach to your business at every stage.

experts.title: Mentors and experts
experts.description: Experienced mentors will help you make the right decisions.

education.title: Educational modules
education.description: Online and offline training for entrepreneurs.

funding.title: Funding and grants
funding.description: Access to investments, state and European funds.

support.title: State support
support.description: Assistance in using benefits and tax refunds.

application.title: 1. Submit application
application.description: Fill out the online form and tell us about your business.

selection.title: 2. Project selection
selection.description: Expert commission will evaluate motivation, potential and goals.

participation.title: 3. Program participation
participation.description: Training, consultations, product development, investor meetings.

scaling.title: 4. Scaling and growth
scaling.description: Support in entering new markets, attracting customers and funding.

legal.title: 5. Legal and tax support
legal.description: Help with documents, consultations on benefits and taxes.

faq.title: FAQ — Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Short answers to the most common questions about the program

eligibility.question: Who can participate?
eligibility.answer: Companies registered in Poland (SMEs, startups with prototype or revenue).

cost.question: How much does participation cost?
cost.answer: The program is funded from state and European funds. Participation is free.

duration.question: What are the acceleration terms?
duration.answer: From 8 to 12 weeks, depending on the chosen stream and individual plan.

outcome.question: What will I get at the end?
outcome.answer: Scaling strategy, mentoring support, networking, help with entering international markets.

application.question: How to apply?
application.answer: Click 'Submit Application' on the website and fill out the online form. We will contact you after selection.

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.subtitle: Real examples of companies that have grown with our support

codeAll.before: Local startup with prototype of educational solution, no investors.
codeAll.after: Received 1.5M PLN from NCBR, entered foreign markets, expanded team.

thermoEye.before: Idea + prototype for livestock temperature monitoring, no sales.
thermoEye.after: 1.5M PLN from Simpact VC, farm pilots, patent, first customers.

bioelektra.before: Waste processing technology, no expansion due to regulations.
bioelektra.after: GreenEvo, international contracts, awards, EU certification.

petsy.before: E-commerce for pets, limited local sales.
petsy.after: Unleash by Purina, Nestlé support, entry to Austrian and Hungarian markets.

synerise.before: Analytical SaaS platform, worked only in Poland.
synerise.after: International expansion, EU clients, Deloitte Fast 50 awards.

brainly.before: Polish startup app for knowledge sharing between students, local market, limited funding.
brainly.after: Investment from international funds (Naspers, General Catalyst), over 250M users worldwide, offices in US and EU.

news.title: Latest News
news.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest information about our program and success stories

stickyCTA.title: Ready to accelerate your business?
stickyCTA.subtitle: Join our program and get access to funding, mentoring and new markets

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us for more information about our acceleration program.

footer.description: Supporting small and medium businesses in Poland with state acceleration programs, training, mentoring, and funding opportunities.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: By using our website and its subsystems, you entrust us with your information. We understand that this is a great responsibility, and we make every effort to protect your data and give you the ability to manage it. This Privacy Policy describes what information we collect, why we do it, and how you can update, export, delete your data and manage it.

general.title: General Provisions
general.1.1: 1.1. This Privacy Policy defines the procedure for obtaining, storing, processing, using and disclosing personal data of users, visitors and all other interested parties (hereinafter collectively - Users) of the website pa.ua (hereinafter - the site).
general.1.2: 1.2. Personal data of Users during their placement, receipt and transmission of information and documents, as well as during their use of the site, is received by the site owner - LLC "Promavtomatika Vinnytsia" (identification code 34849153, hereinafter - the Company).
general.1.3: 1.3. The User, when submitting an online application (filling out a form) on the site/contacting the site support service by phone, confirms that they have familiarized themselves with this Privacy Policy and expresses their full unconditional agreement with its terms.
general.1.4: 1.4. The User has no right to use the site if they do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy.
general.1.5: 1.5. The User gives their unambiguous consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy and grants the Company the right to collect, register, accumulate, store, adapt, change, renew, use and distribute (dissemination, implementation, transfer), depersonalize, destroy the User's personal data, including using information (automated) systems under the terms of this Privacy Policy. At the same time, the User releases the Company from the obligation to separately notify about the transfer of their personal data to: business partners of the Company involved in areas of economic activity related to the execution and/or processing of user applications and questionnaires regarding cooperation with the Company that arise in the process of using the site.
general.1.6: 1.6. The User bears full responsibility for their actions performed on the site, and the actions of persons performed on their behalf using their personal identification data.
general.1.7: 1.7. The User acknowledges that in case of negligent attitude of the User to the security and protection of their personal data and authorization data, third parties may gain unauthorized access to the account and personal and other user data. The Company is not responsible for damages caused by such access.
general.1.8: 1.8. Sufficient notification to the User about the inclusion of their data in the "Users" database will be a notification in the form of a pop-up notification about familiarization with this Policy.
general.1.9: 1.9. The User is responsible for the accuracy, relevance of data and content of information that is published by them on the site, including after its moderation. The Company has the right to exercise control over information placed by the User, and notify the user who placed information of inappropriate content about such cases.
general.1.10: 1.10. The Company has the right to use the User's personal data for conducting electronic distribution of new and special offers, placing orders for the purchase of products, performing work and providing services.

dataTypes.title: 2. Types of Information and Personal Data That May Be Collected on the Site
dataTypes.2.1: 2.1. First name, last name, patronymic of the User, their contact details (phone, email address, location (geolocation); IP address, type of operating system, browser, time and date of visiting the Site*; form request credentials, open social media profile data, position, tax status of an individual entrepreneur, presence of entrepreneur status, postal and banking details, presence of licenses (permits) for conducting certain types of economic activity, etc.; * Such information can be personal data only if it directly allows identifying the User.
dataTypes.2.2: 2.2. Cookie files to determine the User's browser and provide services dependent on it, for example storing data in the cart between site visits;
dataTypes.2.3: 2.3. Information about violations by the User of the rules for using the site, including in case of the User placing harmful and offensive information and other incorrect information;
dataTypes.2.4: 2.4. All information is collected "as is" and is not changed by the Company during data collection.

purpose.title: 3. Purpose of Using Information and Personal Data of Users
purpose.3.1: 3.1. Information about the User, including personal data, is used by the Company exclusively for the purpose of ensuring the implementation of civil law, tax relations and relations in the field of accounting, fulfillment of contractual obligations for the provision of services, for User identification, for the purpose of product sales, work performance and service provision, payment processing, sending information by mail, email, conducting settlement operations, providing reports, maintaining accounting and management records, improving the quality of service provision, conducting marketing research of the Company, protecting the rights and legitimate interests of users and third parties in accordance with current legislation.
purpose.3.2: 3.2. For User identification and providing them with Services on the site (including their access to using the site), the following may be used: first name, last name, patronymic, email address, password on the site, form request credentials, open social media profile data (for accessing the site through social media accounts; User photographs (in case of their provision for use in the account) information about position, presence of tax status of an individual and their details (including banking), presence of licenses (permits) for conducting certain types of economic activity, etc.
purpose.3.3: 3.3. User contact information may be used in postal distributions, for example: notifications about site news, promotions or special offers, etc. The User can always refuse to conduct distribution on their contact information in a written notification.
purpose.3.4: 3.4. For correspondence regarding the use of the site, product sales, work performance and/or service provision, the following may be used: first name, last name, patronymic of the User, User details, contact phones, email address, User location address.

disclosure.title: 4. Grounds and Conditions for Disclosure of Information and Personal Data of Users
disclosure.4.1: 4.1. The Company does not transfer personal data of Users to third parties, except in cases provided below.
disclosure.4.2: 4.2. The Company guarantees protection of information and personal data of Users from unauthorized access. Personal data of Users included in the personal database is processed on the site automatically, while their storage is carried out in depersonalized and/or encrypted form, which excludes the possibility of identifying a person. Protection is ensured by the impossibility of leakage, destruction and blocking of information, violation of the integrity and access regime to information, encryption of User information for secure data exchange based on modern technologies and encryption protocols, as well as placement of all user data in cloud data centers certified according to the highest international standards of reliability, quality and data storage security.
disclosure.4.3: 4.3. Disclosure of personal data without the User's consent or the person authorized by them is allowed in cases defined by law, and only in the interests of national security, economic well-being and human rights, in particular, but not limited to justified requests from state bodies that have the right to submit requests and receive such data.
disclosure.4.4: 4.4. Disclosure of personal data, including transfer of such data to third parties, is possible and will be carried out exclusively with the User's consent. Such consent of the User may be expressed by them during direct written appeal to the Company.
disclosure.4.5: 4.5. Disclosure of personal data, including transfer of such data to third parties without obtaining written consent of the User, is possible exclusively in exceptional cases, directly provided for by the requirements of current legislation.

modification.title: 5. Procedure for Changing and/or Deleting User Information
modification.5.1: 5.1. Users at any time can change/delete personal information or refuse distribution, for this it is enough to write an email or fill out a feedback form.
modification.5.2: 5.2. Sufficient notification to the User about deletion or other processing of their personal data will be a letter (information) sent to the email specified by the User on the site.

changes.title: 6. Changes to the Privacy Policy
changes.6.1: 6.1. The Company may change the terms of the Privacy Policy by making changes on the site on the page.
changes.6.2: 6.2. Users undertake to periodically review these terms to be informed about how the Company protects User information on the site.
changes.6.3: 6.3. The Company is not responsible for harm or damages suffered by the User or third parties as a result of incorrect understanding or misunderstanding of the terms of this Privacy Policy regarding the procedure for placing data and other technical issues.

rights.title: 7. User Rights
rights.intro: The site user has the following rights in accordance with the Law "On Personal Data Protection":
rights.list1: to know about the sources of collection, location of their personal data, the purpose of their processing, location or place of residence (stay) of the owner or manager of personal data or give appropriate instructions for obtaining this information to persons authorized by them, except in cases established by law;
rights.list2: to receive information about the conditions for providing access to personal data, in particular information about third parties to whom their personal data is transferred;
rights.list4: to receive no later than thirty calendar days from the day of receipt of the request, except in cases provided for by law, a response about whether their personal data is being processed, as well as to receive the content of such personal data;
rights.list5: to present a reasoned demand to the owner of personal data with an objection to the processing of their personal data;
rights.list6: to present a reasoned demand regarding the change or destruction of their personal data by any owner and manager of personal data, if such data is processed illegally or is unreliable;
rights.list7: to protection of their personal data from illegal processing and accidental loss, destruction, damage due to intentional concealment, non-provision or untimely provision, as well as protection from providing information that is unreliable or dishonors the honor, dignity and business reputation of an individual;
rights.list8: to file complaints about the processing of their personal data to the Commissioner of the Verkhovna Rada for Human Rights or to the court;
rights.list9: to apply legal remedies in case of violation of legislation on personal data protection;
rights.list10: to make reservations regarding limitation of the right to process their personal data when giving consent;
rights.list11: to withdraw consent to the processing of personal data;
rights.list12: to know the mechanism of automatic processing of personal data;
rights.list13: to protection from automated decision-making that has legal consequences for them.

other.title: 8. Other Terms
other.8.1: 8.1. In the event that any provision of the Privacy Policy, including any proposal, clause or part thereof, is found to be contrary to law, or invalid, then other provisions that do not contradict the law remain in force and are valid, and any invalid provision, or provision that cannot be performed, is considered changed, corrected to the extent necessary to ensure its validity and possibility of performance.
other.8.2: 8.2. The User has the rights provided for by the Law "On Personal Data Protection".
other.8.3: 8.3. This Privacy Policy applies to the User from the moment when the User agreed to the terms of this Privacy Policy on the site.

terms.title: Offer of Participation in the Acceleration Program

general.title: 1. General Information
general.text: This document constitutes an official offer of participation in the acceleration program organized by WP-Fond.

scope.title: 2. Scope of the Offer
scope.intro: The offer covers the provision of support services for startups and entrepreneurs, including:
scope.list3: Opportunities to obtain grants or funding

participation.title: 3. Conditions of Participation
participation.intro: Applications are submitted through the online form available at [website address].
participation.criteria: Candidates must meet the following criteria:
participation.list1: A registered business entity or a plan for registration
participation.list2: An innovative character of the project

agreement.title: 4. Agreement Conclusion
agreement.text: Acceptance of this offer by submitting an online application is equivalent to entering into a participation agreement in the program under the terms set out in the regulations.

rights.title: 5. Rights and Obligations of the Parties

organizer.title: The Organizer undertakes to:
organizer.list1: Implement the program in accordance with the description
organizer.list2: Ensure access to mentors and training sessions

participant.title: The Participant undertakes to:
participant.list2: Comply with the regulations and schedule

liability.title: 6. Liability
liability.organizer: The Organizer is not responsible for the market success or failure of the participant's project.
liability.participant: The Participant is responsible for the accuracy of the data provided and for fulfilling their obligations.
